subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kenneth Faried scored 22 points, Anthony Davis added all of his 19 in the second half, and the United States rebounded from an uncharacteristic halftime deficit to beat Turkey, 98-77.
snippet: Kenneth Faried scored 22 points, Anthony Davis added all of his 19 in the second half, and the United States rebounded from an uncharacteristic halftime deficit to beat Turkey, 98-77.
